extendedInfo.description: In Letter Land HD Goes To Letter Land you join Pamela Possumâ¢ as she travels around Letter Land doing fun activities that help teach the alphabet.The letters are all designed with nice pastel colors and letter pronunciation occurs when a match is made. This is a great game for your younger children or children and adults who are learning English at an older age.FeaturesMatching of either 8, 12 or 18 pastel letters.Great background music and sound effects.Fun and educational at the same.A point system that gives bonuses for extra concentration.A system that allows children of any age to enjoy and win.Allows for uppercase/lowercase, uppercase/uppercase and lowercase/lowercase matching.Head 2 Head system for 2 players at once in fun turn based game. This is great for siblings, parent/child and among friends.
